question.title: Will the global mean sea level, as measured by satellite altimetry and reported by NASA or NOAA, rise by more than 10 centimeters above the 2020 average level before January 1, 2028?
question.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if the global mean sea level, as measured by satellite altimetry and reported by either NASA or NOAA, rises by more than 10 centimeters above the 2020 average level at any point before January 1, 2028. question.title: Given the global mean sea level rises by more than 10 cm before 2028, will the US Congress pass EV incentives?
question.body: Suppose the following is true: The global mean sea level, as measured by satellite altimetry and reported by NASA or NOAA, rises by more than 10 centimeters above the 2020 average level at any point before January 1, 2028. This measurement must be based on the official data releases from either NASA or NOAA, using their standard methodologies for calculating global mean sea level.
